column4: Could someone please help me with a wireless issue with Hardy on an HP DV2917ca laptop?
no, intel
intel with wireless N
and what is the chipset

how do I paste bin?
youre chipset is a Intel Corporation PRO/Wireless 4965, lemme see what more I can find on it
that card should be supported out of the box, does it work in windows?
it works just fine in Vista
does your laptop have a wireless off switch?
it does, but the switch is 'on' and blue to indicate it's 'working'
well that card should definitly work ootb
try turning wpa2 off on the router and then trying to connect to it
only temporarily to narrow down the issue

using network manager
